articles.title: Kim Jong Un Supervises Test-launch of Inter-continental Ballistic Rocket Hwasong-14
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Supervises Test-launch of Inter-continental Ballistic Rocket Hwasong-14
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The scientists and technicians of the DPRK Academy of Defence Science on July 4 successfully carried out the test-launch of the inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 newly developed by them under the personal guidance of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un supervised the test-launch on the spot.
					
					 Over a few days ahead of the test-launch, he frequented the place where the general drive for assembling the rocket was underway and meticulously guided the scientists and technicians in their busy preparations for the test-launch.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the newly made inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14, he stressed that the protracted showdown with the U.S. imperialists has reached its final phase and it is the time for the DPRK to demonstrate its mettle to the U.S. which is testing its will in defiance of its warning.
					
					 At dawn of the day of the test-launch he again came out to the rocket test-launching ground to acquaint himself with the plan for the test-launch.
					
					 The test-launch was aimed to confirm the tactical and technological specifications and technological features of the newly developed inter-continental ballistic rocket capable of carrying large-sized heavy nuclear warhead and to finally verify all technical features of the payload of the rocket during its atmospheric reentry including the heat-resisting features and structural safety of the warhead tip of ICBM made of newly developed domestic carbon compound material, in particular.
					
					 By order of the respected Supreme Leader, the inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 of Juche Korea was launched on 9:00 a.m.
					
					 The test-launch confirmed the features of the rocket's blast-off from its launching pad and technological features of its guidance and stability system in its active-flight stages and structural system.
					
					 It also reconfirmed the features of starting and stopping the first-stage high-thrust engine and confirmed the starting, stopping and working features of the newly developed second-stage engine of higher thrust under actual flying conditions.
					
					 It also checked the operational accuracy and creditability of the newly designed stage-separation system, reconfirmed the attitude control features of the heavy warhead in intermediate course after its separation from the rocket and confirmed the homing features and structural safety during the harshest atmospheric reentry environment.
					
					 Specifically, the inner temperature of the warhead tip was maintained at 25 to 45 degrees centigrade despite the harsh atmospheric reentry conditions of having to face the heat reaching thousands of degrees centigrade, extreme overload and vibration, the nuclear warhead detonation control device successfully worked, and the warhead accurately hit the targeted waters without any structural breakdown at the end of its flight.
					
					  The test-fire verified that the maneuverability of the mobile launcher loaded with an inter-continental ballistic rocket and all technological specifications of preparatory processes for launch were suited to the tactical and technological requirements of the weapon system.
					
					 He watched the flight of the rocket displayed on monitors at the observation post.
					
					 He analyzed the results of the test-fire of Hwasong-14 and declared that it was a very great success.
					
					 He, with a broad smile on his face, told officials, scientists and technicians that the U.S. would be displeased to witness the DPRK's strategic option as it was given a "package of gifts" incurring its disfavor by the DPRK on its "Independence Day", calling on them with to frequently send big and small "gift packages" to the Yankees as ever so that they would not feel weary.
					
					 He highly praised the scientists and technicians of the Academy of Defence Science for thrillingly succeeding at one try in even the test-launch of Hwasong-14 capable of striking the U.S. mainland this time, thus fully demonstrating the dignity of independent Juche Korea and indomitable spirit of its heroic people and devotedly defending the absolute authority of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Saying that the great success in the test-launch of Hwasong-14 is another brilliant victory of the Korean people in their struggle against the U.S.-led imperialists, he expressed high respect and thanks to the great Korean people who have absolutely supported and upheld the WPK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts without any vacillation despite the U.S. imperialists' and their followers' blatant challenge and manifold hardships.
					
					 Noting that the overall national power and strategic position of the DPRK have been put on a new level as it is possessed of A-bomb, H-bomb and even inter-continental ballistic rocket, he said that everyone should take pride in having firmly consolidated the powerful nuclear war deterrence despite the hostile forces' persistent pressure and sanctions.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK would neither put its nukes and ballistic rockets on the table of negotiations in any case nor flinch even an inch from the road of bolstering the nuclear force chosen by itself unless the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat to the DPRK are definitely terminated.
					
					 He had a photo session with the scientists, technicians and officials of the Academy of Defence Science who successfully conducted the test-launch of Hwasong-14.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Rak Gyom, Kim Jong Sik, Jong Sung Il, Jang Chang Ha, Jon Il Ho, Yu Jin and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Friendly Gathering with Russian Youth Delegation
articles.content:
Friendly Gathering with Russian Youth Delegation
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A friendly gathering with a delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation took place at the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, officials of the youth league, youth and students and members of the delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation led by First Secretary of its Central Committee Vladimir Isakov who is secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					
					 Jong Yong Nam warmly welcomed the delegation, saying that the Korean youth would as ever value the tradition of friendship between the two countries, boost solidarity with the Russian youth and struggle for the international justice and global independence under the banner of anti-imperialist independence.
					
					 Vladimir Isakov and other speakers said that the Korean youth who hold the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu in high esteem are the happiest youth in the world and they would more positively introduce the DPRK, the great country envied by the world, to the Russian youth.
					
					 Then a performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the youth league.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the World Food Programme mission here Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill with the approach of the 23rd anniversary of demise of the President.
					 They laid a floral basket at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Oath-taking Meeting of Workers and Trade Union Members
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meeting of Workers and Trade Union Members
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting of workers and trade union members was held at the Central Hall of Workers Wednesday on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise.
					 Among those present was Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 At the meeting, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK), made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers noted that President Kim Il Sung fathered the Juche idea, the Songun idea and had led the Korean revolution only to the victory with the might of self-development as a treasured sword for the victory of the revolution.
					
					 They also referred to the fact that he provided the tradition for building a mass political organization of the working during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and formed a trade union after the liberation of the country and had led the union to fully discharge its and duty as a reliable helper and defender of the Party at every stage and in every period of the developing revolution.
					
					 They called for holding the President and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and giving full play to the spirit and stamina of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class in the struggle to bring earlier the final victory in the building of a socialist power, united closer around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Successful Test-launch of Hwasong-14 Hailed
articles.content:
Successful Test-launch of Hwasong-14 Hailed
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK succeeded in the test-launch of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14, a great event noteworthy in the history of building a nuclear power of Juche. Upon receiving the news, all the people of the country are extending warm congratulations to the scientists and technicians of the Academy of Defence Science.
					 The success in the test-launch of inter-continental ballistic rocket at one go-off is just a victory of the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and an auspicious event like lifting up the earth at one try, said Ri Sun Chol, a department head of Kim Chaek University of Technology, when interviewed by KCNA in front of a large electronic display at Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 He added:
					
					 This showed once again the world people that nonsensical is U.S.-style sophism that the DPRK has no longer a future unless it "changes its line" and "abandons nuclear program".
					
					 The historic deeds which are taking place one after another in the field of defence science of the DPRK despite the imperialists' persistent sanctions and pressure are the shinning victory which clearly showed once again that no one on earth can match the might of the army and people of the DPRK aspiring after independence and justice.
					
					 Those in the field of defence science of the DPRK will send the U.S. and its followers more "gift packages" as they are steeped in gangster-like logic unconditionally denying any ballistic rocket or satellite of the DPRK. Thunder of the DPRK defending justice will more loudly resound forth over the world.
					
					 I extend once again my warm congratulations to the scientists and technicians of the Academy of Defence Science, who have displayed the might of the best powerful country.

articles.title: Campaign for Preventing Drought Damage Goes on in South, North Hwanghae Provinces of DPRK
articles.content:
Campaign for Preventing Drought Damage Goes on in South, North Hwanghae Provinces of DPRK
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The campaign for preventing drought damage is going on in North and South Hwanghae provinces, the DPRK.
					 According to the information at the State Hydro-meteorological Administration, it rained in the whole areas of the country on July 2 and 3, but the precipitations of North and South Hwanghae provinces were 59 mm and 19 mm respectively.
					
					 The campaign for preventing drought damage is being pushed forward in the countryside of the provinces.
					
					 The Naedong Cooperative Farm in Kangryong County, South Hwanghae Province dug 67 wells and 36 water holes and is keeping full operation of irrigation facilities, including sprinklers and water pumps.
					
					 Yonan County built 550 wells, 283 water holes, 9 underground reservoirs and 78 dammed pools. 
					
					 North Hwanghae Province has mobilized all vehicles to transport water.
					
					 And a new watering method invented by the Ryonggung Cooperative Farm in Hwangju County of the province has been introduced into the farms of the province.
					
					 At least 320 wells, water holes, tube-wells, reservoirs and dammed pools were restored or newly built in 16 farms, including the Okchon and Chonghak cooperative farms in Phyongsan County.

articles.title: New Technological Books Published
articles.content:
New Technological Books Published
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Various publishing houses in the DPRK have produced a lot of books conducive to turning the country into a talented nation and making all the people well versed in science and technology.
					 The Science and Encyclopedia Publishing House brought out such books which help cultivate scientific and technical judgment among the working people and youth and students and provide them with profound knowledge and common sense.
					
					 The Industrial Publishing House published up to 80 kinds of books dealing with scientific and technical data.
					
					 The Art and Literature Publishing House, the Foreign Language Books Publishing House and other publishing houses, too, brought out similar books covering the valuable data of various fields including industry, agriculture and public health.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Human Cause of Independence Praised by World Progressives
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Human Cause of Independence Praised by World Progressives
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung, the Korean people and world progressives are deeply revering him who performed the immortal feats for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					 The President made the greatest efforts for political independence and national prosperity of African countries.
					
					 He fully supported the Algerian people who held a banner of the anti-imperialist and anti-colonialist armed struggle for the first time in the African continent. When the Algerian people gained the final victory, he saw to it that the DPRK government recognized the Algerian government before any others and established diplomatic relations with it. 
					
					 When Samora Moises Machel, ex-president of the Mozambique Liberation Front, visited the DPRK in order to tide over difficulties in the Mozambique national liberation struggle, Kim Il Sung met with him and told him about the orientation and way of overcoming the difficulties, while telling the experience gained during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 As taught by Kim Il Sung, Machel put an end to the imperialists' colonial rule and achieved the independence of the country.
					
					 Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, also received the immutable truth about the revolutionary struggle from Kim Il Sung. He indicated the way of hastening the final victory in the struggle. He made sure that a DPRK delegation was dispatched to Zimbabwe so that its people provided a sure guarantee for consolidating its regime after its independence.
					
					 So, Mugabe told that it is the second revolutionary victory in his country to have the army faithful to the party and people in a short period.
					
					 Meanwhile, President Kim Il Sung gave helping hands to Uganda and Namibia in their struggle for national liberation.

articles.title: ICBM Test-Launch Is Demonstration of Juche Korea's Invincible Might: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
ICBM Test-Launch Is Demonstration of Juche Korea's Invincible Might: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK succeeded at a go in the test-launch of inter-continental ballistic missile Hwasong-14 Tuesday.
					 The test-launch was carried out at the maximum angle launch system and did not give any adverse effect to the security of neighboring countries.
					
					 The success in the test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14, final gate to rounding off the state nuclear force, at just one try is a powerful manifestation of the invincible state might and the tremendous capability of the self-reliant national defence industry of Juche Korea that has advanced at a remarkably rapid pace under the great Workers' Party of Korea's new line on the simultaneous development of the two fronts, and a great auspicious event to be specially recorded in the history of the DPRK which has long craved for powerful defence capabilities.
					
					 The overall strength of the DPRK and its strategic position has been placed on the new highest since its possession of the ICBM as well as A-bomb and H-bomb.
					
					 This is of truly heavy and special significance in ensuring peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and the region and it meant a great victory won by Juche Korea in the stand-off with the imperialists and the U.S.
					
					 We feel pride and self-esteem of having bolstered up the powerful deterrence to a nuclear war despite the persistent pressure and sanctions by the hostile forces.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the chieftain that compelled the DPRK into developing inter-continental ballistic rocket is the U.S. which has persistently pursued the anachronistic hostile policy to destroy the sovereignty and the right existence of the DPRK for decades.
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK has possessed of the nuclear deterrence for self-defence and bolstered it up to cope with the U.S. reckless hostile policy and undisguised nuclear threat.
					
					 The launch would help the hostile forces clearly understand whether the DPRK's ballistic rocket would become an actual threat to the U.S. or not.
					
					 The U.S. frequently carry out missile interception tests and bluffs that it would intercept inter-continental ballistic rocket flying into the U.S. mainland, but what if.
					
					 It should neither shun nor misjudge the reality that the whole U.S. mainland is within the striking range of the DPRK and all the powerful means for mounting annihilating strike is in the hands of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. strategy of strength aimed to test the DPRK while talking about "maximum pressure and engagement" will never work on it.
					
					 Unless a fundamental end is put to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the nuclear threat to it, the DPRK will never put the nuke and ballistic rocket on the negotiating table nor take even an inch back from the road of bolstering the nuclear force which it has already taken. 
					
					 One has to adopt a new way of thinking, first, if one wants to deal with the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korea: Cheonan City Authorities' Humiliating Deed Protested
articles.content:
S. Korea: Cheonan City Authorities' Humiliating Deed Protested
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Civil and public circles of Cheonan City, South Chungchong Province of south Korea condemned the city authorities for mulling collecting a huge amount of taxes for the upkeep of U.S. aggression forces, according to Yonhap News on July 2.
					 In June last the city authorities planned to hold a "celebration" under the pretext of introducing the city to the GIs and their families who are going to Phyongthaek, Kyonggi Province near the city.
					
					 The citizens strongly reacted to the plan.

articles.title: Labor Rights Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Labor Rights Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Unions under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions reportedly held rallies in different parts of Seoul on July 1 in demand of the abolition of part-time jobs and ensuring labor rights amid the general strike by labor movement organizations.
					 The Freight Workers' Solidarity headquarters of the Public Transport Trade Union called for ensuring labor rights of workers at the rally attended by more than 4 500 freight and transport workers.
					
					 The Democratic General Federation of Trade Unions staged demonstrations in streets, urging the hike of minimum wage and the abolition of part-time jobs in public field.
					
					 The Metal Workers Trade Union and the Medical Solidarity Headquarters of Public Transport Trade Union staged an action calling for stable employment.

articles.title: Three Principles of Korea's Reunification Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Three Principles of Korea's Reunification Supported Abroad
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization on July 1 made public a statement to mark the 45th anniversary of the publication of the historic July 4 joint statement in Korea.
					 It said:
					
					 The three principles of national reunification, set forth in the July 4 joint statement, are a great programme common to the Korean nation that should be consistently held fast to for the improvement of inter-Korean relations and settlement of the reunification issue.
					
					 The principles should be regarded as guidelines to realize the wishes and aspiration of all Koreans for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 National independence provides a fundamental guarantee and principle for resolving the issue of national reunification, and national unity is precisely national reunification.
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization extends invariable support to the struggle of the Korean people who are dynamically advancing under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, foiling every challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					 It wishes the Korean people bigger success in the work for achieving independent reunification of the country and building a powerful country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Korean War Veterans' Council of Russia on June 21.
					 Chairman C. M. Kramarenko of the Council was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from June 21 to July 9 and decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President in the period.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iceland
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iceland
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Reykjavik of Iceland on June 21.
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a seminar, a photo exhibition and other political and cultural events on the occasion of July 8, the 23rd anniversary of Kim Il Sung's demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Finland
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Helsinki on June 22.
					 Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold such political and cultural events as remembrance meeting, seminar, photo exhibition and film show to praise Kim Il Sung's exploits on the occasion of July 8, the 23rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Indonesia
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 22.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from June 25 to July 10 and decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung in the period.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Egypt
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Egypt on June 23.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from June 23 to July 9 and decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung in the period.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Cambodia
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian committee for remembering the great leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed on June 24.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee under an order of King Norodom Sihamoni.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from June 24 to July 13 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President through media and organize political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded Abroad
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between June 8 and 15 to commemorate the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Lecture meetings were held in Russia, Finland and Guinea and round-table talks in Syria, Mexico and Myanmar.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a lecture that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee was of great significance in strengthening the WPK, praising him as a great thinker-theoretician who enriched the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League told about the feats of Kim Jong Il who strengthened the WPK into the party of the leader both in name and reality and into the powerful guiding force of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico and the secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar who is member of its Central Committee referred to the history of Kim Jong Il's guidance over the WPK. They stressed that he built up the WPK into an ever-victorious steel-strong party and a mass party deeply rooted among the popular masses.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Russia and Finland.

articles.title: Miembros de PMA rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Miembros de PMA rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 23 del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, los miembros de la Representacion del Programa Mundial de Alimento en Corea rindieron el dia 5 el homenaje postumo al Presidente y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar un cesto de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la colina Mansu.

articles.title: OSPAA apoya los Tres Principios de Reunificacion de la Patria
articles.content:
OSPAA apoya los Tres Principios de Reunificacion de la Patria
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 45 de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, la Organizacion de Solidaridad de los Pueblos Afro-Asiaticos publico el dia primero la siguiente declaracion:
					Los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, presentados en la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, son el gran programa comun de la nacion coreana a mantener invariablemente para mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y resolver el problema de reunificacion de Corea.
					
					Hay que tomarlos como guia para realizar el deseo y aspiracion de toda la nacion coreana a la paz y reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La independencia nacional deviene la garantia fundamental y el principio principal para la solucion del problema de reintegracion territorial que significa precisamente la unidad nacional.
					
					La Organizacion de Solidaridad de los Pueblos Afro-Asiaticos envia el apoyo total a la lucha del pueblo coreano que bajo la sabia direccion de Su Excelencia Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, avanza con pasos firmes frustrando todos los desafios de las fuerzas opositoras a la reunificacion dentro y fuera del pais. 
					
					Desea que el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en la lucha por la reunificacion independiente del pais y la construccion de una potencia.

articles.title: Sequia sigue azotando las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte y el Sur
articles.content:
Sequia sigue azotando las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte y el Sur
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Continua la campana contra la sequia en las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte y del Sur.
					Segun las informaciones de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica, llovio los dias 2 y 3 pasados en casi todas las regiones del pais, pero las precipitaciones en las dos provincias arriba mencionadas oscilan entre 19mm-59mm. Se preven las lluvias esporadicas en los dias proximos, insuficientes para aligerar los danos por el fenomeno natural.
					
					En los campos de las provincias no cesa la campana de riego.
					
					La granja cooperativa de Naedong del distrito de Kangryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, que fue danada mas que otras, acondiciono 67 pozos y 36 estanques para regar las parcelas secando y pone en pleno funcionamiento los equipos de irrigacion.
					
					En el distrito Yon-an se construyeron 550 pozos, 283 estanques, 9 represas subterraneas y 78 diques de presa, asi que se aseguro la fuente de agua necesaria a la irrigacion de los campos y arrozales.
					
					La provincia de Hwanghae del Norte movilizo todos los medios de transporte de agua y generaliza en las granjas provinciales nuevo metodo de riego inventado en la granja cooperativa de Ryonggung del distrito de Hwangju.
					
					En 16 granjas inclusive las granjas cooperativas de Okchon y Chonghak del distrito de Phyongsan, se repararon o se construyeron nuevamente mas de 320 pozos, estanques, tubos elevadores de agua, depositos de agua y diques de presa.
					
					La dimension danada por la sequia se disminuye de dia en dia gracias a la lucha heroica del ejercito y el pueblo que respondieron al llamamiento del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a levantarse en la campana contra la sequia.

articles.title: Demostracion de poderio invencible de Corea del Juche; comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Demostracion de poderio invencible de Corea del Juche; comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- La RPDC salio exitosa en el lanzamiento del primer intento de cohete balistico intercontinental de tipo Hwasong-14, efectuado el dia 4.
					El disparo se realizo a manera de aumentar la altura y no dio ninguna influencia negativa a la seguridad de los paises circunvecinos.
					
					El exito de primer intento del lanzamiento de ensayo de Hwasong-14, puerta final para completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, deviene una manifestacion de la invencible fuerza nacional de la Corea del Juche y del inagotable poderio de su industria de defensa nacional independiente, fortalecidos y desarrollados vertiginosamente bajo la bandera de nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Igualmente, constituye gran evento jubiloso que se registrara con letras mayusculas en la historia de la RPDC que ha venido anhelando de siglo en siglo la poderosa capacidad de defensa nacional.
					
					Con la posesion del ICBM ademas de la bomba atomica y la otra H, se elevaron a la nueva altura el poderio integral de la RPDC y su posicion estrategica.
					
					El hecho tiene la significacion importantisima y especial en garantizar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y significa ademas una gran victoria de la Corea del Juche en la confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui.
					
					Aun en medio de la presion y sancion persistentes de las fuerzas hostiles, hemos consolidado el disuasivo nuclear, de lo cual nos sentimos orgullosos. 
					
					Ponemos en claro una vez mas que el responsable que empujo a la RPDC al desarrollo del ICBM es precisamente el pais norteamericano que ha venido recurriendo perversamente durante varios decenios a su anacronica politica hostil para exterminar la soberania y el derecho a existencia del pais socialista.
					
					Resultan muy justas las medidas de la RPDC que poseyo y ha venido intensificando el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo frente a las imprudentes maquinaciones hostiles de EE.UU. y su abierta amenaza nuclear.
					
					Esta vez, las fuerzas hostiles pudieron saber exactamente que los cohetes balisticos coreanos son amenazantes o no al territorio norteamericano.   
					
					Son muy absurdas las fanfarronadas de EE.UU. efectuando frecuentemente las pruebas de interceptacion de cohetes contra los cohetes balisticos de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. no debe volver espaldas a la realidad en que todo el territorio norteamericano esta al alcance de golpe de la RPDC y los poderosos medios militares de golpe de represalia estan en las manos de este pais asiatico.
					
					Hoy en dia, no se puede aceptar jamas para la RPDC la estrategia de la fuerza de EE.UU. que intenta a probar a alguien hablando la politica de "maxima presion y compromiso" sobre la RPDC.
					
					Mientras que no se eliminen de raiz la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, esta no pondra en ningun caso sobre la mesa de negociaciones el arma nuclear ni el cohete balistico ni retrocedera jamas del camino ya optado hacia el incremento de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Ante todo, EE.UU. debera tener el nuevo modo de pensar si quiere tratarse hoy dia con la RPDC.
